TopicSection.Content:
Spread.Views also supports Gantt Column which helps users organize their data in a nice scheduler form.

It helps the representation of data to become more productive, enhance its communication, forecast over the long term and track results.

Gantt type column provides a visual overview of milestones and other key dates in a understandable and memorable method. This enables user to maintain timescale based tasks and deliverables on a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly basis.

To use Gantt column, add following Gantt JS reference file and CSS file:

Javascript javascript <link rel="stylesheet" href="./plugins/gantt.css">
<script src="./plugins/gantt.js">

Image below shows an example of Grid using Gantt Column to show records of a project management grid where along with the tasks, its start date and end date is also displayed:

In the above mentioned image:

  • Yellow spans are the normal spans.
  • Blue spans are parent task referenced by other tasks by parentID. They will cover all their children in length.
  • Lines are assigned by predecessorID.
  • Diamonds are the tasks have only start time or end time or their start time equals to their end time.
